Microsoft SharePoint

Brief: Microsoft SharePoint is an advanced organizational tool that enhances collaboration and streamlines information sharing across a team or enterprise. As part of the Microsoft Office 365 suite, SharePoint provides a user-friendly platform designed to help individuals stay connected with their team's sites, files, and news. Its mobile application extends these functionalities, ensuring users can remain productive while on the move.

  • ü§ù User Interaction: Directly tap on a user to view their contact card, collaborations, and current projects.
